synopsis: PxChar_t* PxStrncp_Termy(char *d, char const *s, PxSize_t n);

arguments.name: d
arguments.description: Address to copy the string to

arguments.name: s
arguments.description: Address to copy the string from

arguments.name: n
arguments.description: Maximal count of characters in strings to copy

description.short: Copy a string with fixed length

long.text: PxStrncpy_Term copies at most "n-1" characters. `n` must not be `0`.
